title: sharing the love
content:
hey, here’s what I used to eat when i was a kid in Russia.  
found this today in a Russian groceries store in Sydney and felt the need to share my nostalgic feeling with you.

oh and look at those nice slab serifs!  
gorgeous!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [one.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011012336/http:/typophile.com/files/one_1.jpg) | 60.63 KB |
| [two.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011012336/http:/typophile.com/files/two_0.jpg) | 58.87 KB |
author: victor ivanov

comments.content:
it’s called a ’pryanik’  
it is a sweet, kinda half muffin, half cookie thing.  
its difficult to explain. I used to take one to school for after lunch.
